Key Match Events: Castellanos hit a walk-off single to left field to score Trea Turner from second base in a 7-6 victory
Castellanos' fifth walk-off hit of the year – and the first of his postseason career – evened the series
Harper crushed a two-run homer to center field in the sixth inning
Brandon Nimmo hit a go-ahead homer against Orion Kerkering in the seventh
Phillies scored three runs in the eighth to take a 6-4 lead
Strahm allowed a two-run homer to Mark Vientos in the ninth to tie it
Post-Match Reflections: Castellanos expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Thomson praised Castellanos for his consistency throughout the season
Harper commended Castellanos for his fighting spirit
Miscellaneous Highlights: Castellanos celebrated with his son Liam behind home plate
Fans initially jeered Castellanos for swinging at pitches out of the zone
The game was tied after two games in the current 2-2-1 Division Series format
Castellanos' five walk-offs between the regular season and postseason are tied for the third-most in a single season since 1974
